message: Let's split it evenly to start, see how it goes from here.
You're not getting the better deal this time!
I'll give you a slightly larger share, but I'm not getting taken advantage of!
I'm not budging, take it or leave it!
I'm trying to get a fair deal, but I'm not giving up yet!
I'm not being generous, take what you can get!
I'm trying to hold on to what's left, but I'll give you a bit more.
You're running out of time, take the scraps!
I'm getting desperate, but I'll give you most of it if you'll just meet me halfway.
You're almost out of options, don't make me have to take it all!
I'm not giving up yet, but I'm getting close to desperation.
You've had your chance, now it's all mine!
